channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire - Hollywood; INC#0993; 03:09PM; 5666 W Lexington Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/454I0cz; Hollywood; KNOCKDOWN: 30 firefighters extinguished the fire in 15 minutes with no injuries reported. Firefighters contained the fire to the room of origin, preventing it from extending to the attic or adjoining units. Building type updated to a three-plex with two units on the first floor and one unit on the 2nd floor. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 82; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC5 E227 E235 E35 E52 E82 RA35 RA835 T27 T35; CH9; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

title.a: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire - Valley Glen 07/26/2023 INC#0966

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire - Valley Glen; INC#0966; 03:04PM; 13219 W Vanowen St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3OvSpJ7; Valley Glen; KNOCKDOWN: 20 firefighters extinguished the fire in 20 minutes with no injuries reported. Firefighters made entry to the attic and determined the fire was in the walls and had not extended up into the attic. No further details.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC11 BC14 E75 E88 RA102 RA77 T60; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire - Hollywood; INC#0993; 02:54PM; 5666 W Lexington Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/454I0cz; Hollywood; One story, single family dwelling with fire showing from one room. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. One additional task force requested.; FS 82; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC5 E227 E52 E82 RA35 RA835 T27; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0966; 02:44PM; 13217 W Vanowen St; MAP: https://bit.ly/44zzhzr; Valley Glen; One story single family dwelling with a working attic fire. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E75 E88 RA102 T60; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Brush Fire - Assisting Agency; INC#0889; 02:01PM; 21050 Burbank Bl Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Ydft2C; Woodland Hills; LAFD resources are responding to a request from LACoFD for additional resources. The size up from LACoFD is 1/2 acre in medium to heavy brush with a moderate rate of spread/winds. ALL further incident information will come from LACoFD and all media questions are referred to their agency.; FS 84; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; AO1 BC17 BC4 BC9 CM40 CM42 DZ45 E19 E23 E263 E269 E290 E37 E59 E69 E90 EM9 H2 H3 H4 H7 HA2 HA3 HA4 HA7 HE1 RA69 T63 T69 T90; CH5; 12; Margaret Stewart

Traffic; INC#0124; 02:20AM; Wb 10 Fy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Khb9JL; Palms; Vehicle went over embankment and landed in encampment with a total of five patients. Three patients extricated from the vehicle and transported in *at least* serious condition. Two patients transported in fair condition. Ages/genders unknown. Any media questions are referred to CHP Log # 198 and LAPD Inc# 0336; FS 58; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; BC11 BC18 CM20 CM22 E226 E261 E292 E294 E43 E58 E61 E94 EM1 EM11 EM9 RA43 RA58 RA61 RA68 RA858 RA894 RA94 T26 T61 T92 T94; CH4; 12; Margaret Stewart

Brush Fire - Assisting Agency; INC#1130; 03:24PM; 15320 N Sierra Hw x Golden State Fwy; MAP: https://bit.ly/43FliHa; Sylmar; #VictorIncident Approximately 5 acres of heavy brush burning in 10-15mph winds with no structures currently threatened. This incident is in LACoFD jurisdiction and LAFD will be an Assisting Agency. All further updates will come from LACoFD.; FS 18; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 BC15 E275 E28 E290 E298 E75 E8 E91 E98 EM15 H1 H3 H7 HA1 HA3 HA7 RA90 T75 T90 T98; CH5; 17; Margaret Stewart

Update Brush Fire; INC#0889; 01:32PM; 11400 Poema Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/44ZRnKJ; outside city; This incident is determined to be 100% inside Los Angeles County Fire Department jurisdiction and they will assume Incident Command. Any additional updates will come from LACoFD. ; FS 96; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District outside city; AO1 AO2 BC15 BC17 CW3A E103 E104 E106 E107 E287 E290 E296 E70 E8 E90 EM15 H1 H2 H3 HA1 HA2 RA104 RA90 T87 T90 T96; CH5; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0706; 01:17PM; 570 N Normandie Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3DumIJK; East Hollywood; KNOCKDOWN: Over 70 firefighters achieved full knockdown in two hours and three minutes. This will remain an active incident for an extensive overhaul operations. Cause and $ loss TBD. There are no additional injuries beyond the two firefighters transported earlier due to heat related illness. No further details.; FS 52; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC1 BC11 BC18 CM20 CM22 CM52 E20 E205 E226 E229 E235 E261 E27 E29 E35 E5 E52 E6 E9 EA1 EM1 EM11 EM14 EM5 HR3 RA29 RA35 RA52 RA6 RA806 RA82 RM3 RT59 T26 T29 T35 T5 T61 UR5 UR88; CH7; 12 13; Margaret Stewart

Brush Fire; INC#0889; 12:59PM; 11400 Poema Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/44ZRnKJ; outside city; 1/4 acre burning in heavy brush under mild wind conditions (previous burn area). There is one exposure -two story condominium. Firefighters are currently anchoring the fire with handlines to prevent any progression.; FS 96; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District outside city; BC15 BC17 CW3A E103 E104 E107 E287 E296 E70 E8 E90 EM15 H1 H2 H3 HA1 HA2 RA90 T87 T96; CH5; 17; Margaret Stewart
